name: The Gift (itch) (pianotm)
description:
You play as a little drummer boy, a good-natured, hard-working boy who's learned that a new king is born and he wants to give him a gift, but he's poor and is determined to give him the gift of music. He works hard to prove himself worthy of seeking the king. He leaves his nameless village and passes through the town of Aesora. He helps an apothecary make the medicine she needs for a patient, and from Aesora, he makes his way to Bethlehem.

Made with White Screw graphics, The Gift is an item collection/scavenger hunting game. It prominently features the Christmas carol, Little Drummer Boy, and uses the updated MV versions of original 2003 RTP music.
